messages: Name's Bob.
Stone Cold Bob Austin.
Right, what's yours, then?

You don't know who I am?
We've both lived here for years!

Don't know nobody. All I know is,
gotta keep everyone out.
You know, unless their name is Bob.
Bob?

Bob. Camel case.
Nice and plain.
Traditional.

'Cause this club is Bobs-only.
You know, the Bobs-Only Club.
Why is it Bobs only?

Why?
Why is it Bobs only?

Why, it wouldn't be the Bobs-Only Club
if I just let anyone in!
So, what's your name then?
Um.... it's not Bob.

Sorry, can't unlock the door for ya.
Bobs only.

Why, what luck!
My name happens to be Bob!

Nice. Great name.
I'll unlock the door.
There you go. It's open.

Hey, what gives?
I still can't get in.
Oh, it's unlocked.
Then why won't it open?
Oh. The door's not implemented yet.
You could've said that from the start!

Not my job. My only job is to
keep everyone out who's
not named Bob.
So, what's your name, then?

The door doesn't work!
What does it matter what
my name is?

Not my job.
My only job is to keep everyone out
who's not named Bob.
Ah, a citizen!
I wondered if you could help me!
What do you need?

My name's Swagger!
Max Swagger!

I was doing a bit of reconnoissance,
looking for a place where I can
open my new fashion shop.

The board here says there's space
available, but I can't seem to find
the building it's talking about.

The only thing actually here is
the Bobs-Only Club!

Well, the town isn't fully implemented
yet, so... you might have to wait
a few more weeks for the rest of
the buildings to return.
Not fully implemented?
Sorry.

But I can personally guarantee
you can have a building all to yourself
when the time comes.
Oh! That's good news! All to myself?
I'm picturing two stories... no, three!

Lush woven carpets... vaulted ceilings...
beautiful oak doors...
hand-carved decorative moulding....

Um, well....
You'll definitely get a building.

Excellent! Then I shall return
when the time comes!
Until that glorious day, farewell!

Not much of a market for fashion here,
I would've thought.
Best of luck, Max Swagger!
I'm practicing for my triathlon!

Running is my weakest event, so I'm
working hard to improve my time!
Don't you need legs to run?
No?
I'm gonna be a Blitzball when I grow up!
Honk!

Back when he was a young man,
my husband Delmar hand-carved
all the statues on the fountains
around town.

Such a shame that this one isn't working.
I wonder if something is clogging
the pump.

Between you and me....
I think the goose has something
to do with it.
Me heard you will soon have a birthday!

That's right! I'll be turning 16,
and I'll get to be an official
village mage!
Me hope you have happy birthday!
Thanks very much, Trekkie!

I'm so glad the goats made up
and are friends again!
Baaahhh!
Meowwowow.

That's what I've been saying
this whole time!
Meowwrrrr!
Oh, I know!
Meowrrow.
Oh, you don't say!
Meow!
He didn't!
Hey there, cat!

Excuse me, but we were in the middle
of a conversation.
Oh, sorry. Carry on.

I came here on a blacksmithing
scholarship, but there's not much
blacksmithing to do at the moment.

I think I'll stick around anyway.
See what happens.
Am I asleep?
Huh? Is this the village?

No, this is the village of the past. But
I still have Ring Zero....
This has got to be a dream.
End this dream?
